Cooley: Physically looking in better shape. His Eyelids flip up to Expose his Biological Eyes. Looking at Rodimus, "You need to look not with Logic but with Hope, Your spark shall find the matrix." Cooley then looks over to WinLord, "I know that Time has ran out but he needs to be put into Stasis to find the Spark. By the way have the others cmome back yet?" Cooley then pulls up a chair and eases himself down into the chair. He then pulls out of a pocket compartment a small flask of Energon and takes a drink.
